artist: Artist: Pierre Bonnard; Author: Paul Verlaine; Woodcutter: Woodcuts by Tony Beltrand; Publisher: Ambroise Vollard, Paris; Printer: Imprimerie Nationale, Paris; Printer: Lithography by Auguste Clot, Paris; Book Binder: Georges Cretté
description: Decorative binding by Georges Crette, French, 1893-1969. Binding: gray morocco with inlaid rose morocco, gilt and blind fillets, and gilt lettering. Doublures of rose silk, with paste paper guards; all edges gilt. Matching chemise and slipcase.
image_copyright: © Artists Rights Society %28ARS%29%2C New York %2F ADAGP%2C Paris
medium: Lithographs in rose ink, wood engravings, and letterpress; bound volume
provenance: Bruce B. Dayton, Wayzata, Minn.; given to MIA, 1985.
title: Parallèlement (In Parallel)
